title: Star Wars Planet Guide
description: A tool for Star Wars fans to browse and learn about the different planets of the Star Wars extended universe.
technology: The Planet Guide makes use of redux-saga to handle asynchronous events such as the API calls to SWAPI. The DevExtreme React Grid component is used to present the data in a table handling filtering, sorting and the display of detailed information.
